General.Name: Century Iron And Steel Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Century Iron and Steel Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel structures in Taiwan and Myanmar. The company is also involved in the welding of steel structure; and assembling and exporting of wind power turbines. Its products are used in high-rise buildings, bridges, factories, public construction, and other projects. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.1119, Zhongshan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 328
